post.body: I have no idea what the hell I'm doing, but hey, I'm just a fool anyway.
So, wenn hier schon ein Sprachfilter existiert, kann man die Sprachen hier irgendwie markieren?
言語でフィルターを使えるのに書き込みには言語を選ぶ機能がない…自動認識しているってこと？

comment.body: @霸王寨第一光头: I speak only 3 languages, German (native), English (close to native) and Japanese (also native-ish).
@霸王寨第一光头: So if the language filter only detects different characters how would it distinguish between Swedish, Danish, German, And Turkish? Not at all? They all use the same or similar umlauts.
